00322 inline ItemTypes::entryrestriction_t 
00323 GfxRoadPolygon::getEntryRestrictions(int node) const
00324 {
00325    MC2_ASSERT( (node == 0) || (node == 1));
00326    if (node == 0)

00328    return m_entryrestrictions1;
